001package org.biopax.validator.api;
002
003/**
004 * A controlled vocabulary (ontology) term restriction.
005 *
006 * @author rodch
007 */
008public final class CvRestriction {
009        
010        private final String id; //e.g., "GO:0005575"
011    private final String ontologyId; // "GO"
012        private final boolean allowed;
013    private final UseChildTerms childrenAllowed;
014    private final boolean not;
015        
016        public CvRestriction(String id, String ontologyId, boolean useThisTerm, 
017                        UseChildTerms useChildTerms, boolean isNot) {
018                this.id = id;
019                this.ontologyId = ontologyId;
020                this.allowed = useThisTerm;
021                this.childrenAllowed = useChildTerms;
022                this.not = isNot;
023        }
024        
025        public String getId() {
026                return id;
027        }
028
029        public String getOntologyId() {
030                return ontologyId;
031        }
032
033        public boolean isTermAllowed() {
034                return allowed;
035        }
036
037        
038        public UseChildTerms getChildrenAllowed() {
039                return childrenAllowed;
040        }
041        
042        public boolean isNot() {
043                return not;
044        }
045        
046        @Override
047        public String toString() {
048                return ((not)? "NOT allowed " : "Valid '") 
049                        + ontologyId + "' terms: " 
050                        + ((allowed)? id + " and " : "") 
051                        + childrenAllowed.toString() + " children of " + id;
052        }
053        
054        public enum UseChildTerms {
055                ALL, DIRECT, NONE;
056        }
057}
